translated: His son will be known as Fine Flower; his principal attendant will be known as Fine Worship.

original: 'od kyi tog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: 'od kyi tog ces bya ba mkhas pa ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Light of Glory;🔽the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Light of Glory.

original: tog gi 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can; ;'dus pa lan grangs gsum ste kun la yang //
analyzed: tog gi 'od ces bya ba rdzu 'phrul can; ;'dus pa lan grangs gsum ste kun la yang //
translated: He will hold three assemblies, each num bering twenty thousand times ten million

original: sras mchog slob pa med par phyin pa po //🔽bye ba phrag ni nyi khri nyi khri yod //
analyzed: sras mchog slob pa med par phyin pa po // bye ba phrag ni nyi khri nyi khri yod //
translated: of those who have reached the highest state of being, those who are beyond training.

original: mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin //🔽dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs bdun khri chig stong yin // dam pa'i chos dag lo grangs stong phrag ni //
translated: The hum an life span will be seventy-one thousand years,🔽and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further

original: brgyad bcu dag gi bar du gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: brgyad bcu dag gi bar du gnas par 'gyur //
translated: eighty thousand years.

original: rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku gdung mchod rten gcig yin te //
translated: There will be a single relic of this Jina, and a single stupa extending for seven yojanas.

original: dpag tshad gsum pa rin chen mang pos spras //
analyzed: dpag tshad gsum pa rin chen mang pos spras //
translated: and the one with the greatest wisdom will be known as Great Brilliance.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od dag gi /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'od dag gi /
translated: The Tathagata Tejorasi

original: skye ba'i yul ni mchod cing bkur zhes bya //🔽rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni mchod cing bkur zhes bya // rgyal ba'i rigs ni bram ze 'od kyi tshad //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called W orshiped and Honored.

original: dpag tshad drug yod yab ni legs rgal yin //
analyzed: dpag tshad drug yod yab ni legs rgal yin //
translated: This Jina will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for six yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Good Crossing;

original: yon tan brgyan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //🔽sras po mkhas ldan snang ldan rim gro pa //
analyzed: yon tan brgyan zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum // sras po mkhas ldan snang ldan rim gro pa //
translated: the m other of the Jina will be known as Ornament of Virtue.

original: srid pa li 'ching pa gco byed mkhas pa ste //🔽srid pa @283a *//
analyzed: srid pa li 'ching pa gco byed mkhas pa ste // srid pa @283a *//
translated: His son will be known as Wise One; his principal attendant will be known as Endowed with Light.🔽The one of skill will be known as Cutting the Bonds of Existence;

original: 'joms shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: 'joms shes bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Destroyer of Existence.

original: 'dus pa lan grangs dag ni brgya yin te //
analyzed: 'dus pa lan grangs dag ni brgya yin te //
translated: He will hold one h u n d red assemblies, each num bering one billion

original: bsod nams rnam grol dgra bcom mi slob pa //🔽de dag 'dus pa ther 'bum tshad par yod //
analyzed: bsod nams rnam grol dgra bcom mi slob pa // de dag 'dus pa ther 'bum tshad par yod //
translated: Arhats w ho are free from all merit and from all learning.

original: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs dag ni dgu khri yin //
translated: The hum an life span will be ninety thousand years,

original: dam chos lo grangs bye bar gnas 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dam chos lo grangs bye bar gnas 'gyur zhing //
translated: and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further ten million years.

original: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la; ;mchod rten grangs ni ther 'bum phrag gsum ste //🔽rnam rgyal khang bzang lta bur legs par spras //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sku gdung dag ni rgyas 'gyur la; ;mchod rten grangs ni ther 'bum phrag gsum ste // rnam rgyal khang bzang lta bur legs par spras //
translated: There will be a single relic of this Jina, and a single stupa extending for seven yojanas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po yi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po yi //
translated: The Tathagata Mahaprabha

original: skye ba'i yul ni chos kyi 'od ces bya //🔽rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad //
analyzed: skye ba'i yul ni chos kyi 'od ces bya // rigs ni bram ze yin te 'od dpag tshad //
translated: will have as birthplace the land called Light of Dharma.🔽He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for seventy-two yojanas.

original: bdun cu rtsa gnyis bdag gnyis chen po yab //
analyzed: bdun cu rtsa gnyis bdag gnyis chen po yab //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Great Splendor;

original: sems mtshungs ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
analyzed: sems mtshungs ma zhes bya ba rgyal ba'i yum //
translated: the m other of the Jina will be known as Lady of Similar Mind.

original: sras po 'od ldan des ldan rim gro pa //
analyzed: sras po 'od ldan des ldan rim gro pa //
translated: His son will be called Endowed with Light; his principal attendant will be known as Endowed with Virtue.

original: shin tu rnam par nges pa mkhas pa ste //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par nges pa mkhas pa ste //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Completely Ascertained;

original: nges thub ces ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can //🔽'dus pa dag ni lan grangs bcu bzhi ste; ;kun la 'ang dgra bcom pa yi chos dag gi /
analyzed: nges thub ces ni bya ba rdzu 'phrul can // 'dus pa dag ni lan grangs bcu bzhi ste; ;kun la 'ang dgra bcom pa yi chos dag gi /
translated: the one w ith m iraculous abilities will be known as Certainty.🔽He will hold fourteen assemblies, each num bering one billion

original: mtshungs par gyur te ther 'bum ther 'bum yod //
analyzed: mtshungs par gyur te ther 'bum ther 'bum yod //
translated: Arhats who are the same in the Dharma of the destruction of the enemy.

original: mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin //
analyzed: mi tshe lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong yin //
translated: The hum an life span will be ninety-nine thousand years,

original: bdud rnams phung bar mdzad pa'i dam chos dag /
analyzed: bdud rnams phung bar mdzad pa'i dam chos dag /
translated: and the holy Dharma of this one who has destroyed the hordes of Mara🔽will rem ain a further

original: lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong bar du gnas //
analyzed: lo grangs dgu khri dgu stong bar du gnas //
translated: and the holy Dharma will remain a further ninety-nine thousand years.

original: ston pa mya ngan 'das nas rgyal ba yi //
analyzed: ston pa mya ngan 'das nas rgyal ba yi //
translated: After the nirvana of this Teacher,

original: sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgya pa @283b gcig /
analyzed: sku gdung mchod rten dpag tshad brgya pa @283b gcig /
translated: there will be a single relic and a single stupa extending for one hundred yojanas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i tog ces bya'o //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen grags pa skye ba'i yul ni rin po che'i tog ces bya'o // rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
translated: The Tathagata Ratnakirti will have as birthplace the land called Jewel Peak.

original: 'od ni stong gsum tsam mo //
analyzed: 'od ni stong gsum tsam mo //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend throughout the trichiliocosm.

original: yab ni 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ces bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni 'gro ba'i dbang phyug ces bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Lord of Beings;

original: yum ni dpal gyi rin chen mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni dpal gyi rin chen mchog ces bya'o //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Finest Jewel of Glory.

original: sras ni yon tan stong gi gzi brjid ces bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni yon tan stong gi gzi brjid ces bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Brilliance of a Thousand Virtues;

original: rim gro pa ni yon tan mtha' yas shes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni yon tan mtha' yas shes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Boundless Virtue.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan gyi tshogs shes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan gyi tshogs shes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Accumulation of Virtue;

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan grangs grangs med de //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'od zer yid du 'ong ba zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan grangs grangs med de //
translated: the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Delightful Light Rays.

original: thams cad la'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go /
analyzed: thams cad la'ang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go /
translated: He will hold countless assemblies, each num bering only Bodhisattvas who are never in reverse.

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o //
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo drug khri'o //
translated: His life will span sixty thousand years,

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba khri phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba khri phrag sum cu rtsa drug gi bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the holy Dharma will remain a further thirty-six thousand years.

original: mchod rten ni sum 'bum mo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gsal ba skye ba'i //
analyzed: mchod rten ni sum 'bum mo // de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs can gsal ba skye ba'i //
translated: His relics will be extensive, and there will be three hundred thousand stupas.

original: yul ni blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yul ni blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya'o //
translated: (10) The Tathagata Gana-prabhasa will have as birthplace the land called Ocean of Intelligence.

original: rigs ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze'o //
translated: He will be of priestly descent,

original: 'od ni dpag tshad dgu bcu'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad dgu bcu'o //
translated: and his light will extend for ninety yojanas.

original: yab ni bzang mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni bzang mchog ces bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Finest Goodness;

original: yum ni yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs shes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs shes bya'o //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Song of Delight.

original: sras ni sengges rnam par rtse zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni sengges rnam par rtse zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Playful Lion;

original: rim gro ba ni yon tan gyi tshogs shes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro ba ni yon tan gyi tshogs shes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Assembly of Virtue.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni grags pa'i @284a *//🔽sgron ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni grags pa'i @284a *// sgron ma zhes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Lamp of Glory;

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ri mchog rgyal po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni ri mchog rgyal po zhes bya'o //
translated: the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as King of the Finest Mountain.

original: nyan thos 'dus pa dang po ni ther 'bum phrag gsum mo //
analyzed: nyan thos 'dus pa dang po ni ther 'bum phrag gsum mo //
translated: His first assembly of disciples will num ber three billion;

analyzed: gnyis pa la ni ther 'bum phrag bzhi'o //

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o //
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri'o //
translated: His life will span eighty thousand years.

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du gnas so //
translated: The holy Dharma will remain a further eighty-four thousand years.

original: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mtha' yas skye ba'i yul ni yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs zhes bya'o; ;rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
analyzed: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa mtha' yas skye ba'i yul ni yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs zhes bya'o; ;rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
translated: His relics will be extensive.

original: 'od ni dpag tshad gnyis so //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad gnyis so //
translated: The Tathagata Anantamati will have as birthplace the land called Delightful Melody. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for two yojanas.

original: yab ni nor lha zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni nor lha zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be God of Wealth;

original: yum ni rgyu skar bdag ma zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni rin chen mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni rgyu skar bdag ma zhes bya'o // sras ni rin chen mchog ces bya'o //

original: rim gro pa ni bsod nams 'byor ldan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni bsod nams 'byor ldan zhes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Endowed with Wealth of Merit.

analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bsod nams gzi brjid ces bya'o //
translated: the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Brilliance of Merit.

original: 'dus pa ni lan bcu ste //
analyzed: 'dus pa ni lan bcu ste //
translated: He will hold ten assemblies, each num bering one billion.

original: thams cad la yang ther 'bum mo //
analyzed: thams cad la yang ther 'bum mo //
translated: For all of them, it is a trillion.

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo //
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo //
translated: His life will span one thousand years,

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga stong gi bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga stong gi bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: and the holy Dharma will remain a further five thousand years.

original: mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //
translated: His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer don @284b yod skye ba'i yul ni don yod stegs zhes bya'o //
translated: (10) The Tathagata Amogasiddhi will have as birthplace the land called Approach of the Meaningful.

analyzed: rigs ni bram ze'o //
translated: He will be of priestly descent,

original: 'od ni dpag tshad sum brgya'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad sum brgya'o //

original: yab ni kha dog byin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni kha dog byin zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Gift of Color;

original: yum ni dga' bas lta zhes bya'o //

translated: his m other’s nam e will be Joyful to Behold.

original: sras ni kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rim gro ba ni 'jig rten dga' ba zhes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Joy of the World.

analyzed: dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan drug ste //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i drang srong skye ba'i yul ni kun du rgyas pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya'o //

analyzed: dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan gnyis te // gnyis ka @285a *//

analyzed: la'ang 'bum 'bum mo //

analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /

analyzed: mchod rten yang gcig du zad do //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba'i dbang po skye ba'i yul ni skye bo dga' ba zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs so; ;'od ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam mo //

analyzed: yab ni zla rgyas zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rim gro pa ni khyad par sems shes bya'o // shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni bdud 'joms shes bya'o //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni yid gnyis spong zhes bya'o //

original: dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan lnga ste //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa 'dus pa ni lan lnga ste //

analyzed: thams cad la yang khri phra gra re re'o //

translated: His father’s name will be Joy of Liberation.🔽

original: yum ni yon tan mtha' yas ma zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni skye ba'i mchod rten zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni yon tan mtha' yas ma zhes bya'o // sras ni skye ba'i mchod rten zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Joy of Liberation; his m other’s nam e will be Boundless Virtue.

original: rim gro pa ni lta ba can zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rtsal bdag ces bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni lta ba can zhes bya'o // shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rtsal bdag ces bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Chaitya of Birth; his principal attendant will be known as One of Vision.

original: rdzu 'phrul @290b can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par dag ba'i tog ces bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul @290b can rnams kyi mchog ni rnam par dag ba'i tog ces bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan bdun cu ste //

original: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag gsum cu rtsa drug drug go /
analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag gsum cu rtsa drug drug go /

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri 'o; ;dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so //
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu khri 'o; ;dam pa'i chos ni lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so //
translated: His life will span ninety thousand years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further ten million years.

original: sku gdud ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzi brjid skye ba'i yul ni sgrib pa med pa zhes bya'o; ;rigs ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: sku gdud ni rgyas par 'gyur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzi brjid skye ba'i yul ni sgrib pa med pa zhes bya'o; ;rigs ni bram ze'o //

analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad nyi shu 'o // yab ni sengge'i sems shes bya'o //
translated: The Tathagata Samantaprabhasa will have as birthplace the land called Unimpeded. He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for twenty yojanas.

original: yum ni sems mi 'khrug ces bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni sems mi 'khrug ces bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Lion’s Mind; his m other’s nam e will be Undisturbed Mind.

original: sras ni lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya'o //

original: rim gro ba ni sengge'i mthu rtsal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro ba ni sengge'i mthu rtsal zhes bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Strength of Lions.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni chos kyis blta zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni chos kyis blta zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni bdud rtsi grags pa zhes bya'o //

original: thams cad la yang sa ya phrag gsum gsum mo //

analyzed: mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //

original: 'od ni dpag tshad gcig go /

original: yum ni bsod nams byin zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni chos @291a *//
analyzed: yum ni bsod nams byin zhes bya'o // sras ni chos @291a *//

original: dpal zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dpal zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Glory of the Dharma;🔽his principal attendant will be known as Fine Mind.

original: rim gro pa ni chos dga' zhes bya'o //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'khrug med grags zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan dgu ste //

translated: He will hold nine assemblies, each num bering nine h u n d red million.

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri 'o //
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri 'o //
translated: His life will span eighty thousand years,

original: dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri'i bar du gnas so //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs par gnas skye ba'i yul ni bde bas mthong zhes bya'o //
translated: The Tathagata Brahmasthita will have as birthplace the land called Seeing Happiness.

original: rigs ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze'o //

original: 'od ni dpag tshad drug go /
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad drug go /

analyzed: yab ni sems gsal zhes bya'o //

original: yum ni tshangs byin ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni tshangs byin ma zhes bya'o //
translated: his m other’s nam e will be Gift of Heaven.

analyzed: sras no gzungs kyi dbang phyug ces bya'o //

analyzed: rim gro ba ni sgra mi zad ces bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Inexhaustible Sound.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgrogs mkhas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgrogs mkhas zhes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Skilled in Proclamation;

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen gtod zhes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu rtsa drug ste //🔽thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bdun stong bdun stong ngo //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o //🔽dam pa'i chos kyang lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdud ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /🔽mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa gsung skye ba'i @291b yul ni kun tu skar mda' zhes bya'o //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs so //🔽'od ni dpag tshad drug brgya'o //🔽yab ni skye ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen gtod zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu rtsa drug ste // thams cad la yang bye ba phrag bdun stong bdun stong ngo // sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba'o // dam pa'i chos kyang lo bye ba'i bar du gnas so // sku gdud ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go / mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do // de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa gsung skye ba'i @291b yul ni kun tu skar mda' zhes bya'o // rigs ni rgyal rigs so // 'od ni dpag tshad drug brgya'o // yab ni skye ba'i dbang po zhes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Gift of Jewels; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Gift of Jewels.🔽He will hold fifty-six assemblies, w ith each assembly num bering seven thousand times ten million.🔽His life will span ten million years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further ten million years.🔽His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa.🔽The Tathagata Satyaruta will have as birthplace the land called Everywhere Shooting Stars.🔽He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for six h u n d red yojanas.🔽His father’s nam e will be Lord of Birth; his m other’s nam e will be Lady of the Moon.🔽

original: yum ni ku mu da'i so zhes bya'o; ;sras ni bden dpal zhes bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni dbang po bsdams zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu ldan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni ku mu da'i so zhes bya'o; ;sras ni bden dpal zhes bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni dbang po bsdams zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu ldan zhes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Gift of Jewels; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Boundless Mind. He will hold fifty-six assemblies, w ith each assembly num bering seven thousand times ten million. His life will span ten million years, and the holy D harm a will rem ain a further ten million years. His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa. “ The Tathagata Satya-vacana will have as birthplace the land called Everywhere Shooting Stars. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for six h u n d red yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Lord of Birth; his m other’s nam e will be Lotus Teeth. His son will be called Glory of Truth; his principal attendant will be known as Controlled Faculties. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Endowed w ith Strength; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Boundless Mind. “

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid chen po zhes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid chen po zhes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan bcu bzhi ste //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Great Brilliance; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Great Majesty.

original: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni le dgu khri'o //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag stong stong ngo // sku tshe'i tshad ni le dgu khri'o //
translated: He will hold fourteen assemblies, each num bering one thousand times ten million.

original: dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang lo dgu khri'i bar du gnas so //
translated: His life will span ninety thousand years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further ninety thousand years.

original: sku gdud ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sku gdud ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: His relics will be extensive.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzang skye ba'i yul ni 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa blo bzang skye ba'i yul ni 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya'o //

original: rigs ni bram ze'o; ;'od ni dpag tshad brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o //
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze'o; ;'od ni dpag tshad brgyad stong bzhi brgya'o //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang lo nyi khri bdun stong gi bar du gnas so //

analyzed: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i mthu rtsal skye ba'i yul ni mngon du 'gro bar bya ba zhes bya'o // rigs ni rgyas rigs so //

analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo // yab ni thams cad byin zhes bya'o //

analyzed: yum ni blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o // sras ni thams cad 'dod ces bya'o //

original: rim gro ba ni mngon par grags zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid bzang po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro ba ni mngon par grags zhes bya'o // shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni gzi brjid bzang po zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Desire of All; his principal attendant will be known as Clearly Renowned.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgya ste /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya'o // nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan brgya ste /
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Good Brilliance; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Essence of Purity.

original: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag lnga lnga'o //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag lnga lnga'o // sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum mo //
translated: He will hold one h u n d red assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering five h u n d red million.

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad stong gi bar du gnas so //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo brgyad stong gi bar du gnas so //
translated: His life will span one h u n d red thousand years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further eight thousand years.

original: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: His relics will be extensive.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dgyes skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba dang ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dgyes skye ba'i yul ni dga' ba dang ces bya'o //

original: rigs ni bram ze'o //
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze'o //
translated: He will be of priestly descent,

original: 'od ni dpag tshad lnga'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad lnga'o //
translated: and his light will extend for five yojanas.

original: yab ni 'phags pa dad ces bya'o; ;yum ni lha mchod ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni 'phags pa dad ces bya'o; ;yum ni lha mchod ma zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Faith of Noble Ones; his m other’s nam e will be Worship of the Gods.

original: sras ni mchod 'os zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sras ni mchod 'os zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Worthy of Worship;

analyzed: rim gro ba ni 'jig rten mchod ces bya'o //
translated: his principal attendant will be known as Worship of the World.

analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni yon tan stong @296a *// gi gzi brjid ces bya'o //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mnyam par gnas zhes bya'o //

analyzed: nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan gsum cu rtsa gcig ste; thams cad la'ang sum khri sum khri 'o //
translated: He will hold thirty-one assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering thirty thousand.

original: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu stong gi bar du gnas so //
analyzed: sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dgu stong gi bar du gnas so //
translated: His life will span nine thousand years,

original: sku gdud ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sku gdud ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: and his relics will be extensive.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lha bden skye ba'i yul ni lhas mchod ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lha bden skye ba'i yul ni lhas mchod ces bya'o //
translated: The Tathagata Satyaraja will have as birthplace the land called W orshiped by Gods.

original: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
analyzed: rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
translated: He will be of princely descent,

original: 'od ni mtha' yas so //
analyzed: 'od ni mtha' yas so //
translated: and his light will be boundless.

original: yab ni mchod 'os zhes bya'o //🔽yum ni mchod 'dod ma zhes bya'o; ;sras ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yab ni mchod 'os zhes bya'o // yum ni mchod 'dod ma zhes bya'o; ;sras ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Worthy of Offerings;🔽his m other’s nam e will be Desire to Worship. His son will be called Wheel of the Gods;🔽

original: rim gro pa ni 'jig rten lha zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten mchod nas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro pa ni 'jig rten lha zhes bya'o // shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten mchod nas zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Worthy of Offerings; his m other’s nam e will be Desire to Worship. His son will be called Wheel of the Gods; his principal attendant will be known as God of the World.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo bzang shes bya'o //🔽'dus pa ni lan stong ngo //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo bzang shes bya'o // 'dus pa ni lan stong ngo //

analyzed: thams cad la'ang ther 'bum phrag drug drug go / sku tshe'i tshad ni lo sum khri chig stong ngo //

analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri brgyad stong gi bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po cig tu 'dug go /

analyzed: mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //

analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad stong @296b ngo //
translated: He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for one thousand yojanas.

translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Renowned Mother; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Desire of Delight. He will hold twenty-one assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering one h u n d red thousand. His life will span one thousand years, and the holy D harma will rem ain a further one h u n d red thousand years. His relics will be extensive. The Tathagata Aghadhvaja will have as birthplace the land called Brilliance of Flowers. He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for seven h u n d red yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Highest Flower; his m other’s nam e will be Flower. His son will be called Moon of Flowers; his principal attendant will be known as Flower. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Flower of Virtue; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Flower of Virtue.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni pad ma dkar po'i snying po zhes bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan stong ste //🔽thams cad la'ang drug 'bum drug khri drug khri'o //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo dung phyur phrag brgyad do //🔽dam pa'i chos kyang lo dung phyur phrag brgyad kyi bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //

translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Essence of the White Lotus; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Heart of the White Lotus.🔽He will hold one thousand assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering six h u n d red thousand.🔽His life will span eight h u n d red million years, and the holy D harm a will rem ain a further eight h u n d red million years.🔽His relics will be extensive.

translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Essence of the White Lotus; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Heart of the White Lotus. He will hold one thousand assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering six h u n d red thousand. His life will span eight h u n d red million years, and the holy D harm a will rem ain a further eight h u n d red million years. His relics will be extensive. The Tathagata Gavampati will have as birthplace the land called Light of the Charioteer. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for fourteen yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Light of Virtue; his m other’s nam e will be Lady W orshiped by Gods. His son will be called Clear Merit; his principal attendant will be known as Clear Glory. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Clear Knowledge; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Clear Mind.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'phags pa gsal zhes bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu drug ste //🔽thams cad la'ang dgu khri dgu khri'o //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun stong ngo //🔽dam pa'i chos kyang lo bdun stong gi bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /🔽mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //

translated: The greatest of those possessing supernormal powers will be known as Clear Noble.🔽He will hold sixteen assemblies of disciples,🔽with each assembly numbering ninety thousand.🔽His life will span seven thousand years,🔽and the holy Dharma will remain a further seven thousand years.🔽His relics will consist of a single radiant unit,🔽and there will be a single stupa.🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa skrun par mdzad pa skye ba'i yul ni shin du mdzes pa zhes bya'o //🔽rigs ni bram ze'o //🔽'od ni dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so //🔽yab ni khur stobs can zhes bya'o //🔽yum ni nyi ma can zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni grags pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni tog gi phung po zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni rin chen dpal zhes bya'o //

translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Noble Clarity; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Noble Manifestation. He will hold sixteen assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering ninety thousand. His life will span seven thousand years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further seven thousand years. His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa. The Tathagata Krtanaya will have as birthplace the land called Very Beautiful. He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for forty-two yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Strength of Burden; his m other’s nam e will be Lady of the Sun. His son will be called Lord of Glory; his principal attendant will be known as Mass of Light. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Jewel of Glory; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Great Strength.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu dpal bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu sum ste //🔽thams cad la'ang @302a *//
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu dpal bya'o // nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu sum ste // thams cad la'ang @302a *//
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Strength of the Moon; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Strength of Glory.🔽He will hold thirteen assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering one h u n d red times ten million.🔽

translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Strength of Power; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Glory of Strength. He will hold thirteen assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering one billion.

analyzed: yum ni yon tan phung po zhes bya'o // sras ni mtha' yas mig ces bya'o //

analyzed: rim gro ba ni brtson 'grus mi gtong ba zhes bya'o //

translated: The greatest of the magi­cians will be known as Strength of the Whole.🔽He will hold twenty-one assemblies of disciples,🔽each num bering one billion.🔽His life will span sixty-nine thousand years,🔽and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further seventy-one thousand years.🔽His relics will be extensive.

translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Strength of All Power; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Strength of All Effort. He will hold twenty-one assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering one billion. His life will span sixty-nine thousand years, and the holy D harm a will rem ain a further seventy-one thousand years. His relics will be extensive. The Tathagata Arthasamdhi will have as birthplace the land called Certain Virtue. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for ninety-nine yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Virtue of Meaning; his m other’s nam e will be Lady of Unbounded Brilliance. His son will be called Boundless Glory; his principal attendant will be known as Great Strength. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Spiritual Friend of Beings; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Strength of All Power.

His father will be known as Finest of the Earth; his m other will be known as Immaculate Mind. His son will be called Unconquerable Army; his principal attendant will be known as All-Powerful. analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni sgra can shes pa zhes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Knowing Rahula; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Unwavering Body.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten bla ma zhes bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis te //🔽thams cad la'ang bye ba sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa brgyad do //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri sum stong ngo //

translated: The greatest of those possessing supernormal powers is known as Highest in the World.🔽He will hold twenty-two assemblies of disciples,🔽with each assembly numbering thirty-eight times ten million.🔽His life will span seventy-three thousand years,🔽and the holy Dharma will remain a further seventy-three thousand years.

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /🔽mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po skye ba'i yul ni nor dga' zhes bya'o //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs so //🔽'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o //🔽yab ni bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya'o //🔽yum ni yon tan 'dod ces bya'o //🔽sras ni re mchog ces bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni brgya ba zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal sems shes bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri'i bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /🔽mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer chen po skye ba'i yul ni nor dga' zhes bya'o //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs so //🔽'od ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'o //🔽yab ni bdud rtsi dga' zhes bya'o //🔽yum ni yon tan 'dod ces bya'o //🔽sras ni re mchog ces bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni brgya ba zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni mthu rtsal sems shes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Teacher of the World; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Highest of the World. He will hold twenty-two assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering thirty-eight times ten million. His life will span seventy-three thousand years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further seventy thousand years. His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa. The Tathagata M ahaprabha will have as birthplace the land called Joy of Wealth. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for five h u n d red yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Joy of Immortality; his m other’s nam e will be Desire for Virtue. His son will be called Finest Hope; his principal attendant will be known as One Hundred. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Mind of Strength; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Teacher of the World.

original: rdzu 'phrul can @303b rnams kyi mchog ni rnyog pa med pa'i blo zhes bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gcig ste //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can @303b rnams kyi mchog ni rnyog pa med pa'i blo zhes bya'o // nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gcig ste //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Mind of Non­ agitation; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Un­ disturbed Mind.

original: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag bcu gcig bcu gcig go /🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri chig stong ngo //
analyzed: thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag bcu gcig bcu gcig go / sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun khri chig stong ngo //
translated: He will hold eleven assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering eleven times ten million.

original: dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri gcig stong gi bar du gnas so //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni lo bdun khri gcig stong gi bar du gnas so //
translated: His life will span seventy-one thousand years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further seventy-one thousand years.

original: sku gdung ni rgyas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pas byin skye ba'i yul ni bsam pas yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o // rigs ni rgyal rigs so //

analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad dgu stong ngo // yab ni gsang ba mthong zhes bya'o //
translated: He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for nine thousand yojanas.

original: yum ni brtul zhugs yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni skyon med nga ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yum ni brtul zhugs yang dag 'phags zhes bya'o // sras ni skyon med nga ro zhes bya'o //
translated: His father’s nam e will be Seeing the Secret; his m other’s nam e will be Unexcelled Spiritual Practice.

original: rim gro ba ni rin chen dbyangs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rim gro ba ni rin chen dbyangs zhes bya'o //
translated: His son will be called Faultless Melody; his principal attendant will be known as Song of Jewels.

original: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni dge ba'i spos zhes bya'o //
analyzed: shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni dge ba'i spos zhes bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Incense of Virtue; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Un­ disturbed Mind.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gdangs po che zhes bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gnyis ste //🔽thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag bcu bdun bcu bdun no //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun stong ngo //🔽dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /🔽mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni gdangs po che zhes bya'o // nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan bcu gnyis ste // thams cad la'ang bye ba phrag bcu bdun bcu bdun no // sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bdun stong ngo // dam pa'i chos ni lo stong gi bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go / mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //
translated: The one of skill will be known as Great Sound;🔽the one with miraculous abilities will be known as Great Roar.🔽He will hold twelve assemblies of disciples,🔽with each assembly numbering 170 million.🔽His life will span seven thousand years,🔽and the holy Dharma will remain a further thousand years.🔽His relics will consist of a single radiant unit,🔽and there will be a single stupa.🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams phung po zhes bya'o //🔽rigs ni bram ze'o //🔽'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo //🔽yab ni bsod nams gzi brjid ces @304a *//🔽bya'o; ;yum ni bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni gzi brjid grags pa zhes bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni lha'i grags po zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni nyi ma'i 'od ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams 'od skye ba'i yul ni bsod nams phung po zhes bya'o //🔽rigs ni bram ze'o //🔽'od ni dpag tshad stong ngo //🔽yab ni bsod nams gzi brjid ces @304a *//🔽bya'o; ;yum ni bsod nams 'od zer zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni gzi brjid grags pa zhes bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni lha'i grags po zhes bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni nyi ma'i 'od ces bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Great Brilliance; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Great Strength. He will hold twelve assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering seventeen h u n d red times ten million. His life will span seven th ousand years, and the holy D harm a will rem ain a further one th ousand years. His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa. ( 1 1 7) The Tathagata Punyaprabha will have as birthplace the land called Heap of Merit. He will be of priestly descent, and his light will extend for one thousand yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Brilliance of Merit; his m other’s nam e will be Light Rays of Merit. His son will be called Glorious Brilliance; his principal attendant will be known as Glory of the Gods. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Light of the Sun; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Great Strength. “

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros grags pa zhes bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan drug ste //🔽thams cad la'ang sa ya phrag gsum gsum mo //🔽sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo //🔽dam pa'i chos kyang lo sdong gi bar du gnas so //🔽sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go /🔽mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs skye ba'i yul ni thar ba'i dbyangs shes bya'o //🔽rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni blo gros grags pa zhes bya'o // nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan drug ste // thams cad la'ang sa ya phrag gsum gsum mo // sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo // dam pa'i chos kyang lo sdong gi bar du gnas so // sku gdung ni ril po gcig tu 'dug go / mchod rten yang gcig tu zad do // de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dbyangs skye ba'i yul ni thar ba'i dbyangs shes bya'o // rigs ni rgyal rigs so //
translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Renowned Intellect; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Renowned Mind.🔽He will hold six assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering three million.🔽His life will span one thousand years, and the holy Dharma will rem ain a further one thousand years.🔽His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa.🔽( The Tathagata) Ratnaghosa will have as birthplace the land called Melody of Liberation.🔽He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for thirty-two yojanas.🔽

original: 'od ni dpag tshad bye ba'o //🔽yab ni bee d'urya'i snying po zhes bya'o //🔽yum ni thar pa'i nga ro zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni mi gnas thong ces bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni lhas mchod ces bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten mchod ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'od ni dpag tshad bye ba'o //🔽yab ni bee d'urya'i snying po zhes bya'o //🔽yum ni thar pa'i nga ro zhes bya'o //🔽sras ni mi gnas thong ces bya'o //🔽rim gro ba ni lhas mchod ces bya'o //🔽shes rab can rnams kyi mchog ni 'jig rten mchod ces bya'o //
translated: The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as Renowned Intellect; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Graced w ith Glory. He will hold six assemblies of disciples, w ith each assembly num bering three million. His life will span one thousand years, and the holy D harma will rem ain a further one thousand years. His relics will consist of a single radiant unit, and there will be a single stupa. ( The Tathagata Ratnaghosa will have as birthplace the land called Melody of Liberation. He will be of princely descent, and his light will extend for ten million yojanas. His father’s nam e will be Heart of Lapis Lazuli; his m other’s nam e will be Melody of Liberation. His son will be called Unwavering Gift; his principal attendant will be known as W orshiped by Gods. The follower foremost in w isdom will be known as W orshiped by the World; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Graced w ith Glory.

original: rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog ni klos mchod ces bya'o //🔽nyan thos 'dus pa ni lan lnga bcu ste //

translated: The follower foremost in wisdom will be known as Great Offering; the follower foremost in m iraculous abilities will be known as Offering of the Mind.
